strapiPost.title: ‘Pack The Palace’ In Pink For Breast Cancer Awareness
strapiPost.content:
The Razorback Women’s Basketball team takes on the Missouri Tigers inside Bud Walton Arena on Sunday, Feb 12 at 2p.

  • Pack the palace: Fans are encouraged to wear pink in support of Breast Cancer Awareness as we cheer on the Razorbacks for one of the last three home games during conference play.
  • Family outing: Bring the whole family for fun and entertainment with tickets starting at just $5, plus kids 12 and under get in free with a paying adult!

Purchase your tickets in advance by clicking HERE.
